main event: A round bright red object, the size of a dime at arm's length, was observed in the sky, emitting small stars from its back before climbing to the northeast and disappearing from sight.
interesting points: The object was visible for 20 to 30 seconds,The sighting occurred at 2015 PST on 12 November 1957,The witness experienced it while driving in a car,The object climbed to the northeast until out of view,The report describes characteristics typical of aircraft with after-burning.
